languages.text: Чаны, в которых раньше хранили мазут, превращены в хранилища для крови — ингредиента для гнусных ритуалов, которые пришли на смену упорядоченным протоколам мануфакторума.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Эти чаны, которые раньше использовались для хранения мазута, сейчас наполнены кровью, в которые окунают детали хаос орудий перед сборкой как часть ритуала.

languages.text: The vats, which were previously used to store fuel oil, have been turned into reservoirs for blood — an ingredient for the vile rituals that have replaced the orderly protocols of the manufactorum.
languages.original_text: Чаны, в которых раньше хранили мазут, превращены в хранилища для крови — ингредиента для гнусных ритуалов, которые пришли на смену упорядоченным протоколам мануфакторума.

traits.locale_text: The vats, which were previously used to store fuel oil, have been turned into reservoirs for blood — an ingredient for the vile rituals that have replaced the orderly protocols of the manufactorum.
The vats, which were previously used to store fuel oil, have been turned into reservoirs for blood — an ingredient for the vile rituals that have replaced the orderly protocols of the manufactorum.
The vats, which were previously used to store fuel oil, have been turned into reservoirs for blood — an ingredient for the vile rituals that have replaced the orderly protocols of the manufactorum.
The vats, which were previously used to store fuel oil, have been turned into reservoirs for blood — an ingredient for the vile rituals that have replaced the orderly protocols of the manufactorum.
The vats, which were previously used to store fuel oil, have been turned into reservoirs for blood — an ingredient for the vile rituals that have replaced the orderly protocols of the manufactorum.
The vats, which were previously used to store fuel oil, have been turned into reservoirs for blood — an ingredient for the vile rituals that have replaced the orderly protocols of the manufactorum.

languages.text: 原本用来装燃油的大桶，如今已经变成了一座血库，用来举行邪恶的仪式。制造工厂原本有序的协议早已被取代。
languages.original_text: The vats, which were previously used to store fuel oil, have been turned into reservoirs for blood — an ingredient for the vile rituals that have replaced the orderly protocols of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: 原本用来装燃油的大桶，如今已经变成了一座血库，用来举行邪恶的仪式。制造工厂原本有序的协议早已被取代。

languages.text: Estos tanques, que anteriormente su usaban para almacenar aceite combustible, ahora almacenan sangre para los rituales blasfemos que han sustituido los protocolos regulares del manufactorum.
languages.original_text: The vats, which were previously used to store fuel oil, have been turned into reservoirs for blood — an ingredient for the vile rituals that have replaced the orderly protocols of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: Estos tanques, que anteriormente su usaban para almacenar aceite combustible, ahora almacenan sangre para los rituales blasfemos que han sustituido los protocolos regulares del manufactorum.

languages.text: かつては燃料オイルの保管に使われていたタンクは、血を溜める容器に変わってしまった…この血は、聖工場のきちんとしたプロトコルに代わって行われる悪しき儀式の材料となる。
languages.original_text: The vats, which were previously used to store fuel oil, have been turned into reservoirs for blood — an ingredient for the vile rituals that have replaced the orderly protocols of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: かつては燃料オイルの保管に使われていたタンクは、血を溜める容器に変わってしまった…この血は、聖工場のきちんとしたプロトコルに代わって行われる悪しき儀式の材料となる。

languages.text: Die Tanks, in denen früher Schweröl gelagert wurde, wurden zu Blutlagern umfunktioniert – eine Zutat für die widerlichen Rituale, die die herkömmlichen Protokolle des Manufactorums abgelöst haben.
languages.original_text: The vats, which were previously used to store fuel oil, have been turned into reservoirs for blood — an ingredient for the vile rituals that have replaced the orderly protocols of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: Die Tanks, in denen früher Schweröl gelagert wurde, wurden zu Blutlagern umfunktioniert – eine Zutat für die widerlichen Rituale, die die herkömmlichen Protokolle des Manufactorums abgelöst haben.

languages.text: Les cuves, qui servaient autrefois à stocker du mazout, ont été transformées en réservoirs de sang, ingrédient incontournable des ignobles rituels ayant remplacé les protocoles rigoureux du manufactorum.
languages.original_text: The vats, which were previously used to store fuel oil, have been turned into reservoirs for blood — an ingredient for the vile rituals that have replaced the orderly protocols of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: Les cuves, qui servaient autrefois à stocker du mazout, ont été transformées en réservoirs de sang, ingrédient incontournable des ignobles rituels ayant remplacé les protocoles rigoureux du manufactorum.

languages.text: Daha evvel akaryakıt deposu görevi gören variller içi kanla doldurulmuş. Kan, manufaktorumun düzenli protokollerinin yerini alan iğrenç ayinler için kullanılıyor.
languages.original_text: The vats, which were previously used to store fuel oil, have been turned into reservoirs for blood — an ingredient for the vile rituals that have replaced the orderly protocols of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: Daha evvel akaryakıt depolama görevini gören variller şimdi kanla doldurulmuş. Kanı, manufaktorumun düzenli protokollerinin yerini alan iğrenç ayinler için kullanıyorlar.
